C D G I L N O R S T W 

S

sendData(T) - Method in class networking.NetworkCommunication
Writes the specified data into the connection's output stream, and flushes the stream.
sendDataTo(T, Predicate<Server.ServerClient>) - Method in class networking.Server
Sends the specified data object to the specified clients that are identified by the predicate.
sendDataToAll(T) - Method in class networking.Server
Sends the specified data object to all connected clients.
sendDataToSingle(T, Server.ServerClient) - Method in class networking.Server
Sends the specified data object to the specified client.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class networking.DisconnectClientPacket
The generated UID of the packet.
Server - Class in networking
The Server class is the backend foundation for the server.
Server() - Constructor for class networking.Server
 
server - Variable in class networking.Server.ServerClient
The server this client is connected to.
server - Variable in class networking.Server.ServerThread
The server owner of this thread.
Server.ServerClient - Class in networking
The ServerClient class is the client representation on the server side, a modification of the Client class.
Server.ServerThread - Class in networking
The ServerThread class manages the networking transmission on a separate thread.
ServerClient(Server, Socket) - Constructor for class networking.Server.ServerClient
Constructs a new client on the server.
serverSocket - Variable in class networking.Server
The socket of the server.
ServerThread(Server) - Constructor for class networking.Server.ServerThread
Creates a new thread for the server, and calls begins the networking communication loop.
socket - Variable in class networking.Client
The client's socket.
startServer(int) - Method in class networking.Server
Attempts to start the server.
stopServer() - Method in class networking.Server
Stops the server from running, which terminates all connections.
